description: Primary key. Also the general assembly number.
E.g., "88th General Assembly"
Date and time the record was inserted into the database.
Four digit year of the first day of the first session of the general assembly. This should be the year after the general election in which members of this assembly were elected.
Four digit year of the last day the last session of the general assembly.

The party which the member caucused with during the assembly.

The counties which the assembly member represented.
Foreign key referencing the race candidate record in which member was elected to the assembly.
